divs: Sighting Detailsspending lots of time on the upper deck of my home with the ceiling fan on to get some relief from the heat,usually after 10pm.My son has been telling me that he has been trying to take a picture of a large hoovering ball of light he has been seeing after 10pm and early AM,1-2 AM,.on his camera the object looked liked a tiny dot.One evening we were sitingand talking about this orange ball of light and the light in BlueSprings,when a 2 diamond shaped onjected appeareed in the sky just above the tree line with a rotating band of light from our color sprcturm ,changing colors from my right to the left,both objects were staggered to my right.Slowly this bright orange of light formed below the tree branches ,moving slowly toward the top of the the tree tops,looking like a large yellow orange glowing big basketball,hoovering and slowly moving toward the right slowing postioning itself below the first ojectect,then below the 2nd onject,turing sideways,bcoming a black disc,slowing turning float againg,glowing and driftin toward the NE and dimmed to nothing.Iwas excited to see something like this and then fearful,because who would believe it.
Summary: Large round basketball shaped yellow-orange ball of light manifested thur the lower branches of a large towering tree,then noted to rise to the top at of the tre and above and moved at a steady rate a nd pattern,turned sideways,black,back orange ,out
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Lee's Summit
There was one other sighting in Lee's Summit on or around June 8th 2012
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
